function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor air pollution contributing to the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and related health problems","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems and air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Air purification systems, HEPA filters, and UV-C lights","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, especially in low-resource settings","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Exposure to indoor pollutants as a result of poor ventilation","Impact":"Higher absolute levels of exposure, compounded by poorer health infrastructure","Mitigation":"Investment in improving ventilation and better health infrastructure","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air exchange systems, and indoor air quality monitors","People":"Community members in low-resource settings","Owner":"Government health agencies, building owners"},{"Description":"Link between air pollution and virus spread","Impact":"Contributing to the COVID-19 pandemic and increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Reducing air pollution levels through regulation and enforcement","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, emission control technology","People":"Populations exposed to air pollution","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government authorities"}]}
